newsitem.title: USA: CBOT soy drops on optimistic yield signs in Ill..
newsitem.headline: CBOT soy drops on optimistic yield signs in Ill..

text.p: CBOT soybean futures dropped on the open on a crop tour report of optimistic yield prospects in Illinois, traders said.
"Results from the crop tour and weather," a trader said referring to the bearish tone in early dealings.
Crop scouts on the Professional Farmers of America tour of the Midwest overnight indicated good yield prospects this year in Illinois.
At 0935 CDT, soybeans were three to five cents per bushel lower, with September down 3-1/4 at $7.97 a bushel.
